pages.text: Your tools with this enchantment seem to dissolve all things they mine into thin air. Broken down into the finest sand and blown away by the wind.\\For this one time, however, when you want to knock half a city out of rough stone, it might even come in handy. Some things are probably curse and blessing at the same time.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Destroys the drops of all broken blocks.\\Max Level: 1\Applicable to mining tools.

pages.title: Enchanter Recipe
pages.text: You can infuse a [#](bb00bb)common Book[#]() with Curse of the Void by surrounding your [Enchanter](book://enchanting/enchanter) with [Pigment](book://general/pigment) and the other required materials.
